flounce.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to walk in a quick determined way without looking at people because you are angry
flounce.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: She flounced out of the room.
flounce.translation[1].definitions[0].de: a wide band of cloth with folds, which is stitched onto the edge of a skirt, dress, shirt, or curtain as a decoration
flounce.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: The dress had red satin flounces at the bottom.
flounce.translation[1].definitions[1].de: a way of walking in a quick determined way without looking at people, because you are angry
flounce.translation[1].definitions[1].ex: She walked off with a flounce.
